Title: Prohibits certain battery energy storage systems within one thousand feet of a populated area, in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Prohibits tier two battery energy storage systems within one thousand feet of a populated area, in a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to prohibiting certain battery energy storage systems within one thousand feet of a populated area, in a city with a population of one million or more
